definition: Structural elements that hold, direct, or channel materials like water, air, or solids

positive_examples: The wooden beam supported the entire roof structure
Water flowed through the irrigation ditch to the cornfield
She pulled the rubber plug from the bathtub drain
The metal tube channeled hot air into the furnace
Rainwater collected in the natural basin below the cliff
negative_examples: The hammer broke when it hit the nail
She wore a beautiful silver necklace to dinner
The car engine started on the first try
He read the newspaper while drinking coffee
The artist painted a landscape with mountains
The clock chimed twelve times at midnight
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Tool, Vehicle, Weapon, Furniture
